verbs.description: [ARG0: south carolina deputies] [V: fired] [ARGM-TMP: after driving van in hurricane florence floodwaters] [ARGM-ADV: killing two mental health patients] a pair of south carolina deputies have been fired for driving a transport van into hurricane florence floodwaters which resulted in the deaths of two female mental health patients horry county correction officers stephen flood and joshua bishop were transporting 45-year - old wendy newton and 43-year - old nicolette green to mental health facility as part of a court order when their vehicle became inundated with water green and newton both stephen flood justin bamberg wendy newton hurricane florence brooke holden nicolette green horry county south carolina joshua bishop horry county south carolina
